titles.title: You Hold All Power In Your Hand

properties.verseOrder: v1 v1 v2 v3 v3 v4

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You hold all power in your hand
Jehovah
and all creation will proclaim your majesty
The nations bow down at your throne
Proclaiming you reign
You reign

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Anyi ekele ya
Odironyedikagi
Anyi ekele ya
Odironyedika chukwu
Omemma
Omemma

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Agam e buru Aleluya
Elu
Elu
Elu
Agam e buru Aleluya
Elu
Elu
Elu

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You’re wonderful
You’re wonderful
Wonderful in your way
